statements.query: MATCH (sng:DBSubnetGroup)<-[:PART_OF_DB_SUBNET_GROUP]-(:RDSInstance)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE sng.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH sng LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (sng) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (n:RDSInstance)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
